Project Description
An implementation of Microsoft.Synchronization.ClientServices.OfflineSyncProvider using Perst4.NET written in C# / Silverlight for Windows Phone.

Lets you use McObject's embedded object database Perst as an offline storage for Microsoft Sync Framework Toolkit.

This project is developed and tested on Windows Phone but it should work fine for other scenarios, too.

Key features
  • Much faster than the originial IsolatedStorageOfflineContext
  • Supports multi-threaded access
  • Supports serializeable transactions (as far as it is supported by Perst)
  • Full source code available

Dependencies
  • Microsoft Sync Framework Toolkit
  • Perst4.NET
